title: Control Set Parameters for PID and PI Controllers
description:
RES_NI calculated the resistance of a NI-resistance sensor from the input
values T (temperature in°C) and R0 (resistance at 0°C).
The calculation is done using the formula:
RES_NI = R0 + A*T + B*T²+C*T4
A = 0.5485
B = 0.665E-3
C = 2.805E-9
The calculation is suitable for temperatures from -60.. +180 °C.
name: CONTROL_SET2

input.name: PI
input.description: Flag to indicate if PI control is to be used.

input.name: PID
input.description: Flag to indicate if PID control is to be used.

input.name: P_K
input.description: Proportional gain for the PI controller, default is 1.0.

input.name: PI_K
input.description: Proportional gain for the PID controller, default is 0.9.

input.name: PI_TN
input.description: Integral time for the PI controller, default is 3.33.

input.name: PID_K
input.description: Proportional gain for the PI controller, default is 1.2.

input.name: PID_TN
input.description: Integral time for the PID controller, default is 2.0.

input.name: PID_TV
input.description: Derivative time for the PID controller, default is 0.5.
